articles.title: Ex-union minister Margaret Alva is Opposition’s vice presidential candidate
articles.description: The decision was taken at a meeting held at NCP president Sharad Pawar’s residence. Announcing the decision Pawar said that 17 Opposition parties have unanimously decided Alva’s name.

articles.title: Paramilitary Officer Dies In Terrorist Attack In Kashmir's Pulwama
articles.description: A paramilitary officer was killed in action after a terrorist attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pulwama on Sunday. This was the second major attack on security forces in the last one week.
articles.content:
The terrorists fired at a check post at Gangoo crossing in Pulwama from apple orchards, police said.
